ek rathriyaka apa kohedo gos'with geta godawa mohothak yannata maththen amma ka gasagena aawe wayitata pissu wage kiyamini.kohomath un wadath ladi ape ammatath chuti mamatathya.amma dutuwanama puruddata men duwagena aawath, ee wayitage purudu sahallu hasirima nowana bawath katin sema halamin aa bawath kiwita kisidineka pissu ballan sambandha athdakim nothibu matath nangitath mahath bayak danini.ewakata awurudu 9k pamana wu math dan adi 6k wuwa ewakata batu atayak wu nangith aarakshawata setiyakata nagagena kanduluperagena un hati mathak wi mata dan hinaya.ee setiye usa wayitage usama wageya.api pissu hadunayayi kiyu wayitagen berennata nagge ehew ekakataya.punchi mole tharama kiyanne eekataya.ape handimath wilapayath nisa thaththa kiwe wayita kawaho hapakannata kalin uuta wedi thabiya yuthuya kiyaya.ese kiya pistholayakuth gena thaththa ape surathal wayitata wedi thiyannata sarasenu dutu apa wayitawa beragannata thabu wilapaya biyawi thabu wilapayata wada hapan wimen wedi thabima pasekala apawa nalawagannata thaththatath ammatath siduwiya.awasanaye wayita apa nodanama waththa konaka awasan husma hela thibini.ee lesama brawunith tobith miyagiyaha.blaki miyagiye sanipayata laga un naminan gasak pamula sithala sewanakaya.gasata hisa heththu karawagena nidi iriyawwenma blaki apen samugena thibini.

basmathi sahalwalata samana digati hadayen yuthu thaththwayen bala sahal wargayak welendapolata nikuth kara athayi krushikarma amathyanshaya pawasayi.widesha ratawalwalin aanayanaya karana basmathi sahal itha kuda pramanayakata mese bala sahal wishala pramanayak kalawam kara mese welendapolata nikuth kara thibe.pramithiyen bala basmathi sahal sambandhayen amathyanshaya sidu karana lada wimarshanayaka di me bawa heli wi atha.me nisa uthsawa samaye di mila di ganna basmathi sahal pilibandawa wadi awadhanayak yomu karana lesa amathiwaraya janathawata danwa sitiyi.basmathi sahal shighrayen janathawa athara prachalithawa pawathina nisa ee sambandhayen wimarshanaya kirimata menma aanayanika pramithiya widhimath kirimata krushikarma amathyanshaya mangin me wana wita wishesha niladharin puhunu kara thibena bawath amathiwaraya kiyayi.basmathi sahal nishpadanayata dahawale unusma sahitha indiyawa pakisthanaya wani ratawala nishpadanaya kerena basmathi sahal wagawata kalagunayak da rathi්raye shitha kalagunayak da awashya wana bawath basmathi wi wagawe aswanu nelimata wi wapura masa 4ka pamana kalayak gatha wana bawath hethema pawasayi..
